Uses of Class
xxl.core.indexStructures.BPlusTree.NodeConverter

  • Packages that use BPlusTree.NodeConverter 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.

    • Uses of BPlusTree.NodeConverter in xxl.core.indexStructures

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HilbertRTree.NodeConverter 
      class  MVBT.NodeConverter
      This Converter is concerned with serializing of nodes to write or read them into or from the external storage.
      class  MVBTPlus.NodeConverter
      Converter for MVBTPlus Nodes.
      class  MVBTree.NodeConverter
      This Converter is concerned with serializing of nodes to write or read them into or from the external storage.
      Fields in xxl.core.indexStructures declared as BPlusTree.NodeConverter 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BPlusTree.NodeConverter BPlusTree.nodeConverter
      This Converter is used to read or write nodes (i.e. blocks) from or into the external storage.
